title: Dog Sledding Adventure
summary: Drive your own dog sled team through snow-covered wilderness and experience the bond between musher and huskies.
description: Experience the ancient art of dog sledding with our friendly husky teams. You'll learn to handle the sled, command the dogs, and navigate through beautiful winter forests. This is an unforgettable experience that connects you with Lapland's traditional culture.

gallery.caption: Dog sled team ready for adventure
